properties.entry: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, SALE, ADDRESS, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 3, ?, ?, 2, 'Y', ? ,?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = '3'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM B_LIKE L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO ) AS B_LIKE, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (B.BOARD_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 3 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC)A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 4 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC
